get.description: **Deprecated**: Use POST /case-users/search instead: were query params have been moved into the request payload, to avoid hitting *414 URI Too Long* issues.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Keyword `Bearer` followed by a valid IDAM user token

parameters.name: case_ids
parameters.description: case_ids

parameters.name: ServiceAuthorization
parameters.description: Valid Service-to-Service JWT token for a whitelisted micro-service

parameters.name: user_ids
parameters.description: user_ids

400.description:
One or more of the following reasons:
1. Case ID is not valid, 
2. Case ID list is empty, 
3. User ID is not valid.

403.description: Access to other user's case role assignments not granted

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Keyword `Bearer` followed by a valid IDAM user token

parameters.name: caseAssignedUserRolesRequest
parameters.description: List of Case-User-Role assignments to add

parameters.name: ServiceAuthorization
parameters.description: Valid Service-to-Service JWT token for an approved micro-service

400.description:
One or more of the following reasons:
1. Case user roles list is empty, 
2. Case ID is not valid: has to be a valid 16-digit Luhn number, 
3. User ID is not valid: has to be a string of length > 0, 
4. Case role name format is invalid: has to be a none-empty string in square brackets, 
5. Organisation ID is not valid: has to be a non-empty string, when present.

401.description: Authentication failure due to invalid / expired tokens (IDAM / S2S).

403.description:
One of the following reasons:
1. Unauthorised S2S service
2. Client service not authorised to perform operation.

get.summary: Retrieve an Event Trigger for a Case by Event ID
get.description: This operation creates an event token for a specific event to be started for a case and returns the token, along with the visible case details to the invoking user as per their configured access levels.

parameters.description: Keyword `Bearer` followed by a valid IDAM user token

parameters.name: caseId
parameters.description: caseId

parameters.name: eventId
parameters.description: eventId

parameters.name: ignore-warning
parameters.description: ignore-warning

parameters.name: ServiceAuthorization
parameters.description: Valid Service-to-Service JWT token for a whitelisted micro-service

401.description: Authentication failure due to invalid / expired tokens (IDAM / S2S).

422.description:
One of the following reasons:
1. Case event has no pre states
2. Callback validation errors
3. Unable to sanitize document for case field
4. Missing user roles

parameters.description: Case ID for which the event is being submitted

parameters.name: content
experimental
parameters.description: 'true' to use this endpoint

parameters.name: ServiceAuthorization
parameters.description: Valid Service-to-Service JWT token for a whitelisted micro-service

422.description:
The event could not be processed, for example due to one of the following:
- Data validation failed
- Invalid event (e.g. event ID not provided/known)
- Case does not comply with pre-state condition for event

data.description: Case data as defined in case type definition. See `docs/api/case-data.md` for data structure.

data_classification.description: Same structure as `data` with classification (`PUBLIC`, `PRIVATE`, `RESTRICTED`) as field's value.

case_data.description: Case data as defined in case type definition. See `docs/api/case-data.md` for data structure.

data_classification.description: Same structure as `case_data` with classification (`PUBLIC`, `PRIVATE`, `RESTRICTED`) as field's value.
